item.title: Foam Sofa & Loveseat
item.dc:creator: Rakib Al Hasan Rifat
item.description: Relax in style in this ultra sophisticated Power Reclining Living Room Collection by Global Furniture featuring posh crystal tufted arms, sleek brushed nickel backlit power button with built in USB charging port and full chaise design for the ultimate in comfort.
item.content:encoded:
PRODUCT DETAILS

Upholstery Material: Linen Blend Frame Material: Solid Wood Leg Material: Plastic Seat Construction: Mdf Seat Fill Material: Foam and Inner Spring Back Fill Material: Foam

[Contemporary Style] The perfect pick for meeting your aesthetic needs, this set features a contemporary look and a streamlined silhouette. The brass nail head trip tastefully lines the edges while the gilded patterned fabric offers a natural sheen featuring button tufted back cushions.

[Compact Structure] The compact structure of this sofa set is suitable for a cozy living room while providing ample seating space. Arrange the 3 pieces together or move the armchair to bedroom according to your needs.

[Sturdy & Functional] Expertly crafted with a solid wood frame for maximum support, this set is equipped with durability for years to come. Deep seating space is designed for hosting extra guests, while the 3-seat sofa can also be used as a daybed for a nap.

[High-quality] Upholstery Material: Linen Blend Frame Material: Solid Wood Leg Material: Plastic Seat Construction: Mdf Seat Fill Material: Foam and Inner Spring Back Fill Material: Foam.

MORE INFORMATION

Designer carefully selected Linen-like Polyfabric for wear ability, seam strength, beauty and comfort Seat Cushion Filled with foam and inner Spring for durability and comfort with Tufted back cushion. 

Contemporary style meets elegant, this polished and simple two pieces set comes with a loveseat and a sofa that are fitting for your modern living space. The thick cushions with two pillows that comes with this set make the whole sofa even more comfortable. It is available in black coffee, grey , and warm purple to match with your beautiful rug or coffee table.

MORE PRODUCTS

INFO:

[Product Weight & Size] 295 lbs; Sofa: 32” H x 77.2” W x 30” D. Loveseat: 32” H x 55.1” W x 30” D Armchair: 32” H x 32.7” W x 30” D. This product comes with three boxes.

ADDRESS:

Greenlawn, New York, USA

 Fax: 0212345678

item.title: Eames Plastic Side Chair
item.dc:creator: Rakib Al Hasan Rifat
item.description: The Eames plastic chair is a contemporary version of the legendary Fiberglass Chair designed in 1950. It was originally produced in collaboration with Zenith Plastics for the Museum of Modern Art's Low-Cost Furniture Design Competition and was the first industrially manufactured plastic chair.
item.content:encoded:
Color Quill Grey, Rusty Orange, Grapefruit, Muted Green, Greenish Blue.
Material Polypropylene
Item Dimensions LxWxH 21.5 x 18.5 x 22 inches
Item Weight 9 Pounds
Brand EdgeMod

About this item

  • Classic Eames Style DSW molded plastic side chairs
  • Sturdy walnut wood finished legs and black strengthened steel wire frame
  • Duratech infused plastic for superior strength in a matte finish
  • Plastic non-marking floor protectors
  • Easy to assemble with a 1 year warranty

item.title: Chair with love
item.dc:creator: Rakib Al Hasan Rifat
item.description: These modern chairs are upholstered with high density sponge inside to offer high degree of comfort for sedentary sitting, they also have fully padded cushion seats with a plush velvet upholstery that boosts comfort and soft. They fit and work beside most dining tables in living room or contemporary-themed countertops in kitchens.
item.content:encoded:
VESTIBULUM TEMPUS METUS

Color Navy Blue, Grey
Material Wood Legs
Item Dimensions LxWxH 22 x 22.4 x 33.5 inches
Maximum Weight Recommendation 240 Pounds
Item Weight 29.4 Pounds

About this item

  • These modern chairs are upholstered with high density sponge inside to offer high degree of comfort for sedentary sitting, they also have fully padded cushion seats with a plush velvet upholstery that boosts comfort and soft. They fit and work beside most dining tables in living room or contemporary-themed countertops in kitchens.
  • Soft and beautiful velvet fabric: velvet is thick and luxury, which is very delicate to touch and no irritation to people who have senstive skin. Velvet is soft and the diamond embroidery on the back adds extra detail that really elevated the overall look and lends them the air of a much more expensive piece of furniture.
  • Large thick soft sponge padding seat with highly unanimous ergonomics curved design mid back, reducing your back pressure and provide optimum comfort while sitting.
  • MULTIPLE USAGE: The Velvet Cushion chairs can be used in the dining room, kitchen room, living room, guest room, vacation house as a reading chair, tea corner chair or desk chair, etc.
  • If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us via email and we will give you a satisfactory solution immediately.

item.title: Foam Wooden Chair
item.dc:creator: Rakib Al Hasan Rifat
item.description: Roundhill Furniture Tuchico Contemporary Fabric Accent Chair. Frame constructions have been rigorously tested to simulate the home and transportation environments for improved durability. Solid wood frame legs come in a light brown finish. Corners are glued, blocked and stapled. High-quality plush high-density foam cushioning is upholstered in tan color.
item.content:encoded:
MAECENAS IACULIS

Color Pink, Purple
Material Textile
Item Dimensions LxWxH 25.5 x 22.5 x 36 inches
Furniture Finish  Pink, Purple
Item Weight 18 Pounds

About this item

  • Frame constructions have been rigorously tested to simulate the home and transportation environments for improved durability.
  • Solid wood frame legs come in a light brown finish. Corners are glued, blocked and stapled. High-quality plush high-density foam cushioning is upholstered in tan color.
  • Deep tuck-pleating design and extra thick padding is supremely comfortable.
  • Chair: 25.5″W X 22.5″D X 36″H, Seat: 18″W X 17.5″D X 19″H, Back 18″H, Top of chair back 16.5″W.
  • Photo May Slightly Different From Actual Item in Terms of Color Due to the Lighting During Photo Shooting or the Monitor’s Display.

item.description: The Eames wooden chair & Table is a contemporary version of the legendary Fiberglass Chair designed in 1950.
